meanings.sent1: The smithy was filled with the sound of hammering on metal.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith spent hours every day in his smithy crafting tools.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat wandered into the smithy and got a little too close to the hot forge.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a busy smithy, shaping thoughts and ideas into tangible creations.
meanings.sent5: The old smithy stood as a testament to the craftsmanship of the past.

meanings.definition: A place where metal is worked by a blacksmith.
meanings.sent1: The small village had only one smithy where all the metalwork was done.
meanings.sent2: The glowing embers in the forge illuminated the busy smithy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a shiny nail from the smithy to use in its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the smithy, filling the space with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic clanging of hammers in the smithy was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: The old man inherited the family smithy and continued the tradition.
meanings.sent2: The smithy was a place of hard work and dedication to the craft.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children played hide-and-seek in the dusty smithy.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a blazing forge in the cold smithy of life.
meanings.sent5: The scent of burning coal wafted from the smithy, signaling another day of work.
